source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>It's over. Emet-Selch is no more!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003510_ALPHINAUD決着だ……。
本当に、本当におつかれさま……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003520_ALISAIE<tab>More importantly, how do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> fare?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003520_ALISAIE<tab>あなた、体は大丈夫なの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003530_URIANGER<tab>...What dost thou see?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003530_URIANGER<tab>どうかなさいましたか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>His aether... It is...it is as it used to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003540_YSHTOLA<tab>視えるのよ……彼本来の、エーテルが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>Her aether... It is...it is as it used to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003550_YSHTOLA<tab>視えるのよ……彼女本来の、エーテルが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003560_YSHTOLA<tab>As a disciple of Zodiark, the Ascian was the Darkness to your Light...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003560_YSHTOLAいわばゾディアークの信徒であるエメトセルクは、
光と対極を成す、闇の力を使う……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003570_YSHTOLA<tab>I can but assume that when you set your strength against his, the Light within you was spent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003570_YSHTOLA光と闇が全力でぶつかりあったことで、
あなたの中の光が……相殺された……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003580_RYNE<tab>No. It's more than that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003580_RYNE<tab>それだけじゃありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003590_RYNE<tab>Under the strain of that incredible flood of aether, your soul had begun to break apart. Yet now it seems somehow...restored.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003590_RYNEエーテルの乱れによって、崩壊寸前だった魂が……
なんというか……補われているんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003600_RYNE<tab>I tried to help you before the battle, but Emet-Selch stopped me. So, h-how did you─exactly what did you... Can you tell us what happened?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003600_RYNE私、戦いの前、結局あなたに何もできなかった。
それなのに、なぜ……あのとき何があったんですか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I had help from a hero of this world...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>この世界の英雄に、託されたんだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll explain it all another time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>いつか、ゆっくり話すよ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003610_RYNE<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003610_RYNE<tab>それって……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Where to start...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>ええと……その…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I believe I owe you all an apology. And you most especially.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>申し訳ないことをした……みんなにも……あなたにも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Let's get out of here first!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>とりあえず……帰ろう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm tired─we'll leave the lecture for later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>つかれたから、お説教はあとで

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>'Tis good to see you awake, G'raha Tia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_A11_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>……おはよう、グ・ラハ・ティア

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003640_THANCRED<tab>No arguments here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003640_THANCRED<tab>まったく、そのとおりだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003645_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>うう
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003645_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>うう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well... 'Tis good to be awake!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003650_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>ああ……おはよう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003660_CHAINUZZ<tab>So, those mad souls dove straight into the ocean over there, did they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003660_CHAINUZZ<tab>おい、本当にあいつらが、あっちの海に入っていったんだな！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003670_IRVITHE<tab>Ah, a-all I could see from here was the whale, Master Chai...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003670_IRVITHE<tab>ええと、あいつらっていうか、大きなクジラがですね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003680_DULIACHAI<tab>'Twas surely Alphinaud and those friends of his! They did something <var 1A 02 /var>heroic<var 1A 01 /var>, mark my words!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003680_DULIACHAI絶対にアルフィノちゃんたちよ！
それで、あの子たち何かをやりとげたんだわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003690_DULIACHAI<tab>You need only look up there for proof of that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003690_DULIACHAI<tab>この空が、何よりの証拠じゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003700_CHAINUZZ<tab>As you say, my love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003700_CHAINUZZ<tab>ああ、きっとそのとおりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003710_CHAINUZZ<tab>They're sure to be back─any moment now. Any moment...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003710_CHAINUZZだから、間もなく戻ってくるさ！
ほら……今に！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003720_DULIACHAI<tab>They are coming back, aren't they? I couldn't bear the thought of...of...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003720_DULIACHAI本当に、絶対、戻ってくるわよね？
そうじゃなかったら、私……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003730_DULIACHAI<tab>(SOBBING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003730_DULIACHAI<tab>うっうっ、ぐすっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003740_CHAINUZZ<tab>There, there, dear. Everything will be all right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003740_CHAINUZZ<tab>だだっ、大丈夫だから泣くな……な？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003750_GRITHIL<tab>There! There! Look, over there! Over at the beach!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003750_GRITHILあっ！
見てくれ、浜辺の方！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003760_IRVITHE<tab>Ho there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003760_IRVITHE<tab>おーい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003770_GRITHIL<tab>Greetings!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003770_GRITHIL<tab>おーい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003780_CHAINUZZ<tab>You all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003780_CHAINUZZ<tab>無事かー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003790_DULIACHAI<tab>Welcome baaack!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003790_DULIACHAI<tab>おかえりなさーい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>I didn't think...we'd be swimming...the <var 1A 02 /var>whole<var 1A 01 /var> way back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>まさか……最後に……泳いで戻ってくることになるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Heavens...heavens... Take me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003810_ALPHINAUD<tab>私はもう……げんかい、だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003820_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud!? Oh, hells...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003820_ALISAIE<tab>ちょっと！？　アルフィノ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003830_RYNE<tab>Wait! Where's Urianger!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003830_RYNEた、大変です！
ウリエンジェが、いません！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003840_THANCRED<tab>He must have fallen behind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003840_THANCRED<tab>どこではぐれたんだ……あいつ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003850_RYNE<tab>But...shouldn't we look for him!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003850_RYNE<tab>わ、私、探してきます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>He'll wash up sooner or later.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>いいわよ……きっとすぐ追いつくわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003870_ALISAIE<tab>For the love of─ Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003870_ALISAIE<tab>ねえ、アルフィノってば！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003880_FEOUL<tab>Welcome back, dear ones!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003880_FEOUL<tab>みんな、おかえりなさいなのだわっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus did salvation come to the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>――こうして 第一世界は救われた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The lamps of Amaurot will fade along with Emet-Selch's enchantments, and the depths shall be as once they were.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003900_MYSTERYVOICEエメトセルクの遺した魔力が切れれば
アーモロートの灯は消え もとの海溝に戻るだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mt. Gulg will one day fall, and the Talos below yield to wind and rain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003910_MYSTERYVOICEグルグ火山もいつかは落ち
あの巨大なタロースでさえ 風と雨に崩れゆく

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This tale, too, will fade with time, passing into legend as the world heals and moves on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003920_MYSTERYVOICEこの冒険はそうやって ここからまた始まる世界の
遠い神話になっていくに違いない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nevertheless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>それでも――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As aether obeys the cycle─as death and decay gives way to new life...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003940_MYSTERYVOICE星海に還ったエーテルが
巡り巡って 再び命として芽吹くように

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So too do the memories we share inspire others to rise to greatness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>その英雄の冒険は 誰かの勇気として受け継がれ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>For we who walk before may lead those who walk after.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>受け継いだ者の新たな一歩が また別の者を奮い立たせる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Your road goes ever on, as does your story. As does your legacy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003970_MYSTERYVOICEそうして 失われずに続くのだ
あなたの遥かな旅路も 道を譲った誰かの存在も

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Such is the hero's lot─to touch the lives of countless others...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003980_MYSTERYVOICEこれは そんな繋がり続ける世界をゆく
ある英雄の――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003990_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Excuse me! You're the Warrior of Darkness...aren't you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_003990_NEXTHEROBOYあ、あの！
闇の戦士さま……なんだよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004000_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Where are you from, really? And how did you get to be so strong!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004000_NEXTHEROBOYねえ教えて！
おにいちゃんは、どこから来たの？
どうやって強くなったの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004010_NEXTHEROBOY<tab>Where are you from, really? And how did you get to be so strong!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004010_NEXTHEROBOYねえ教えて！
おねえちゃんは、どこから来たの？
どうやって強くなったの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>By your deeds has the blinding Light been banished from these skies, and the sin eaters driven to retreat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004020_MYSTERYVOICE改めて……
あなたたちのおかげで、第一世界から罪喰いの脅威が去り、
この地を覆う光もまた、消え去った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Although our many hurts will be years in the mending, I have faith that this world and her people will one day be whole once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004030_MYSTERYVOICEこれですべてがもとどおり……とはいかないものの、
ここから少しずつ、この世界は浄化されていくだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With no Rejoining in prospect, the Source need no longer fear the coming of an Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004040_MYSTERYVOICEつまり、第一世界は統合から遠ざかり、
原初世界における第八霊災も、防げたと言っていい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>And with that triumph, the future from which you came will no longer come to pass... Yet, here you still stand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004050_YSHTOLAあなたがもともといた未来に進むことはなくなった、
という意味でもあるけれど……消えたりしないのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...So I do. I wonder if that other age continues onward somehow, cut adrift from time's flow? Or have I simply etched myself a place upon this new block of history?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004060_MYSTERYVOICEどうやらそうらしい。
歴史から切り離されてなお、あの未来が存続しているのか……
あるいは私という存在が、こちらの歴史に刻まれたからなのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Either way, this is an unexpected development.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004070_MYSTERYVOICEしかし……私が残ったことによって、
困った事態にもなっている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As the summoner of your souls, my death was meant to release you back to your world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004080_MYSTERYVOICE本来なら、あなた方の魂は、
召喚者である私の死をもって、原初世界に返されるはずだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yet I am very much alive, and you are still stuck here in the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004090_MYSTERYVOICEだが、私がここにいるばかりに、
あなた方もまた、第一世界に留まってしまっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004100_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believe I speak for us all when I say that we are happy to postpone our return if it means your life is spared. We will seek out another way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004100_ALPHINAUD帰れないのは残念ではあるが……方法なら、改めて探せばいい。
今度は、君が死ななくても済むものをね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004110_ALISAIE<tab>Besides, I never had any intention of rushing home. There are people here I still need to thank, and this means I might actually have time to do so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004110_ALISAIEどのみち、すぐ帰るつもりはなかったし。
こっちでお世話になった人たちを訪ねるための、
おまけの時間ってことにしておくわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004120_URIANGER<tab>Yet we dare not neglect our comrades in the Source.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004120_URIANGER<tab>しかし……原初世界側の様子も気になるところではあります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004130_URIANGER<tab>Mistress Tataru, to name but one, will be most anxious to know how things stand with us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004130_URIANGERタタル嬢や皆さんも、一日千秋の思いで、
お待ちなのではないかと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004140_THANCRED<tab>So─you'll just have to make the journey alone for the moment. Be sure and give a full report to our fellow Scions, would you? Oh, and we'd also appreciate any news you can bring us from back home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004140_THANCREDなあ、お前だけでも一度、原初世界に帰って、
タタルたちへの報告がてら、様子を見てきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then I see no reason to delay. I can open the path from here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>そういうことであれば、すぐにでもここから送ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004160_YSHTOLA<tab>I imagine we each have matters demanding our attention, so let this be a farewell for us all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004160_YSHTOLA私たちは、一度解散しておきましょうか。
それぞれ気になっていることもあるでしょうしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004170_YSHTOLA<tab>Send word when you've resummoned our friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004170_YSHTOLA水晶公、その人が戻ってきたら、
私たちに報せをもらえるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh, and do try to ensure <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> arrives <var 1A 02 /var>within<var 1A 01 /var> the city next time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004180_YSHTOLA<tab>それから……今度は変な場所に飛ばさないようにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hah! Of course! I shall strive for utmost accuracy! No strange forests or unplanned passengers, I promise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004190_MYSTERYVOICEだ、大丈夫だ！
ズレたりしないし、ほかの奴も巻き込まないさ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004200_RYNE<tab>I'm a little relieved, to be honest. I would have been terribly lonely if everyone had suddenly disappeared...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004200_RYNE実は、ちょっとだけ、ほっとしてます。
すぐみなさんとお別れになったら、
寂しいなって思ってたから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004210_RYNE<tab>But I understand that you have to go. Safe journey, Warrior of Darkness. I hope to see you again soon!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004210_RYNE必ずまた、戻ってきてくださいね。
……いってらっしゃい、気をつけて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Just a moment while I attune the portal, then you can be on your way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004220_MYSTERYVOICEでは、魔器を起動しよう。
少し待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When I was a boy, many long years ago...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>――もう 遥か昔になった 子どものころ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...I yearned to stand tall as the heroes of eld.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>唄に 本に謳われる 英雄が好きだった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But like a fool seeking to pluck the stars from the heavens, my every attempt to reprise their deeds fell short...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004250_MYSTERYVOICEそれは 遥か届かぬ星のようで
何度まねをしてみても 本物になれることはなく

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And then, one day, an all but forgotten dream from my youth stood before me, in the flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004260_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>しかし―― ある日 思いもよらず 目の前で瞬いたのだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>A hero who looked to the horizon and beyond, and saw I knew not what.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>この英雄の見据える先には 何があるのだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>All I knew was that I would give anything to stand at that hero's side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004280_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>私もそれを ともに見ることが適うのだろうか――？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Would that it were so easy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004290_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>やはり、簡単なことではないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The glory of the heavens was ever beyond the grasp of those who never thought to reach for it. But if I've gained anything from all of this, it is the courage to stretch out my hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004300_MYSTERYVOICEそれでも、目指して歩かなければ、永遠に届きはしない。
そのための勇気だって、もう十分にもらったじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Do you hear me, G'raha Tia? This is no time for sleeping!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004310_MYSTERYVOICEだから……
眠っている場合じゃないぞ、グ・ラハ・ティア。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004320_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the imperial palace in the Source...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004320_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方 原初世界 魔導城――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>また見張りがやられてやがる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004340_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>To the west gate! I want to know what's happening there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004340_SHADOWHUNTERうぬらは、このまま西門まで進め。
状況を把握し次第、即時連絡せよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004350_ESTINIEN<tab>Same as the others─struck down with a single blow. An unfortunate day to draw guard duty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004350_ESTINIENこいつも、迷いなく急所を斬り裂かれてるぞ。
帝国の城ってのは、ずいぶん物騒なところだな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004360_ESTINIEN<tab>Forgive me. These were your people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004360_ESTINIEN……悪い、軽口がすぎた。
捨てたとはいえ、ここはお前の……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004370_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We took advantage of this slaughter to slip into the palace. 'Tis not for me to grieve them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004370_SHADOWHUNTER構わぬ……。
我とて、この異変に乗じて潜入を企てたのだ、
この者らに手向けられる言葉はない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004380_VARIS<tab>(-???-)Aaagh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004380_VARIS<tab>(-？？？？-)うぐあッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>That was the Emperor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>今のは……陛下……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>Wha─ Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>あっ、おい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004410_ESTINIEN<tab>(GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004410_ESTINIEN<tab>チッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Your Radiance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>ヴァリス陛下ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004430_ZENOS<tab>(-???-)Gaius! You've missed your part in this, I'm afraid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004430_ZENOS(-？？？？-)…………ガイウスか。
遅いな、貴様の役目はもうないぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Identify yourself, demon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004440_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>うぬは……「何」だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004450_ZENOS<tab>You were hoping for the Ascian?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004450_ZENOS(-？？？？-)アシエン……
と言ったほうが、救いがあったか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004460_ZENOS<tab>The craven shed this skin and fled rather than face me. A pity─I was looking forward to crossing blades with myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004460_ZENOS(-？？？？-)あの化生ならば、肉体を捨てて逃亡した。
せっかく「俺」との戦いが愉しめると思ったのだが……失望だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004470_ZENOS<tab>But I cannot deny the feeling of satisfaction...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004470_ZENOS<tab>(-？？？？-)しかして、俺は俺の体を取り戻した……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004480_ZENOS<tab>Body and soul, reunited at last!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004480_ZENOSゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァスの魂と肉体は、
ここに再び結ばれたのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004490_ESTINIEN<tab>What now? The game continues, but the pieces have changed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004490_ESTINIENおい、どうする……！
盤上に置かれてたのは、とんでもない駒だったようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Only if we trust in a paragon's words─a mistake I do not intend to repeat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004500_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>うぬが言葉……我が剣にて確かめてくれようッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>(CRY)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004510_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>うおおおおおおッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004520_VARIS<tab>Gaius!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004520_VARIS<tab>待て……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004530_VARIS<tab>He speaks...the truth...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004530_VARIS<tab>今の話に……嘘はない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004540_VARIS<tab>Elidibus is gone... Tore a hole into the rift...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004540_VARISこの者はゼノスであり……
その肉体を使っていた、アシエン・エリディブスは……
空を裂いて……逃げおおせた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004550_VARIS<tab>(GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004550_VARIS<tab>グッ…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004560_VARIS<tab>Zenos... My foolish, greedy son...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004560_VARIS<tab>だが……ゼノス……我が愚息よ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004570_VARIS<tab>Was a second life not enough? Was the Empire too rich a prize to ignore?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004570_VARIS生者へと返るに留まらず、この国を掌握しようなどと……
分不相応な野望を、抱いたものよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004580_VARIS<tab>True freedom for our nation─our people─will never be won by a spoiled princeling! The burden of this throne is beyond you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004580_VARISうぬぼれるなッ！
この国の使命、歴史からの真なる解放と、人の存続！
貴様ごときに、背負えてかッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004590_ZENOS<tab>Hmph. 'Tis you, Father, who have struggled with this burden. Simply holding the Empire together has occupied your limited faculties.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004590_ZENOS…………ハ。
分不相応とは、己のことでは？
貴方は、始祖から継いだ国を維持するだけのことに必死だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004600_ZENOS<tab>But you may take comfort in knowing that I have no intention of pursuing your tedious agenda, nor am I interested in ruling over the Empire's lands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004600_ZENOS俺は、貴方の窮屈で退屈な思想など継ぐ気はない。
ガレマール帝国を掌握するつもりもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004610_ZENOS<tab>I came only to remove that which ruins my sport. I will not have my prey stolen by your petty wars and cowardly weapons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004610_ZENOSただ……邪魔者を消しにきただけだ。
退屈な戦、くだらぬ兵器……
そんなものに、俺の獲物を、奪われてなるものか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004620_VARIS<tab>You would kill me just for that...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004620_VARISお前は……まさか……
それだけの、ことで…………？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004630_ZENOS<tab>I need no other reason. Any and all who interfere with my hunt...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004630_ZENOSそれ以外の理由などいるまい。
俺の狩りの邪魔をするならば……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004640_ZENOS<tab>...will not do so twice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004640_ZENOS<tab>ことごとく死ねッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004650_VARIS<tab>(SCREAM)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004650_VARIS<tab>グアアアアアアアアッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004660_ZENOS<tab>I heard the Ascian speak of Zodiark and Hydaelyn. Even the will of this star is but a construct of our own making...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004660_ZENOS哀れなアシエンから聞いたぞ……。
ゾディアークにハイデリン……
星の意志すら、創られた力に過ぎないのだと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004670_ZENOS<tab>We shall gorge upon their strength, and then, my friend, our contest shall begin anew.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004670_ZENOSならば次は、それを喰らって、殺しあおうぞ。
我が友よ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004680_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>ゼノス、貴様ぁぁぁぁッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004690_ZENOS<tab>Hmph...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004690_ZENOS<tab>ふっ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004700_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>...May I?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004700_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-？？？？-)<var 48 F20223 /var>……隣、いいかな。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004710_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>You, I think, are from a time beyond ours. Have you followed in the wake of Emet-Selch?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004710_HYTHLODAEUS(-？？？？-)キミは、外の時間を生きている子だね。
さては、エメトセルクを追ってきたのかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004720_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Nay, there is no cause for alarm. I am simply a shade. Here and not here.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004720_HYTHLODAEUS(-？？？？-)おっと、警戒は不要だよ。
ワタシはただの影、ここに在って無いものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004730_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I know only that my name is Hythlodaeus, and that this city is a recreation─a phantom moment plucked from the well of history.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004730_HYTHLODAEUS名を、ヒュトロダエウスという……そう認識している。
ここが、ある時間を写し取っただけの幻影都市だともね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004740_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>These others seem unaware of their pale existence, but I wonder if Emet-Selch's mind was distracted when it came to my reconstitution.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004740_HYTHLODAEUSほかの影たちは、それに気づいていないみたいだけれど……
大方、エメトセルクがワタシを再現するときに、
雑念でも混じったのではないかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004750_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A stray thought would have been enough. “Hythlodaeus will realize the truth,” for example. We were...close friends once, you see...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004750_HYTHLODAEUS「ヒュトロダエウスだったら、真実を見抜くだろう」とかね。
ワタシたちは、これでも良い友人同士だったから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004760_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet in spite of my perception, I play the same role as all the rest─a bit part, meant to bring color and noise to this well-crafted stage. Too much scrutiny, and we shall burst like the fragile bubbles we are.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004760_HYTHLODAEUSとはいえ、結局のところはほかと同じ、
思い出のアーモロートを彩るだけの、にぎやかしにすぎないよ。
ふいに湧いた泡のように、不確かで脆いものさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004770_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thus I tell you again: my presence is naught to concern you. I wish only to share your company whilst we wait.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004770_HYTHLODAEUSだから、キミが気を張る必要もない。
待っている間だけ、ただ、ご一緒させておくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004780_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...If you've come this far, then you know of the catastrophe which awaits us on our “morrow.”<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004780_HYTHLODAEUS……ここまで来ているキミなら、知っているかな。
ワタシたちは、「今日」のあと、大きな災厄に見舞われるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004790_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Final Days. What began as isolated incidents soon swelled into a world-spanning threat...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004790_HYTHLODAEUS最初、局地的にはじまったその災厄は、
やがて星全体におよび、正真正銘の終末と化した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004800_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Convocation of Fourteen─well, it was Thirteen at the time─endeavored to create a will for our star. They would repair the fundamental laws of order and halt the spread of destruction.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004800_HYTHLODAEUS十四人委員会……まあそのときには十三人になってたんだけど、
ともかく彼らは、「星の意志」を創ることで綻びた理を直し、
災厄を鎮めようとしたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004810_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But creation on such a scale required an immense source of power...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004810_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>けれど、それほどの創造には、とても大きな力がいる……。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004820_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Of those of us who still lived, nearly half offered up their lives in the name of salvation.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004820_HYTHLODAEUSだから、生き残った人類のうち、
約半数が自分の命を力として差し出した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004830_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And from their sacrifice, Zodiark was born. Just as we had hoped, He reached forth and halted the march of oblivion.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004830_HYTHLODAEUSそうして生み出されたゾディアークによって、
望みどおり、災厄は退けられたよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004840_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Yet oh how the star had suffered. So many species lost. The land was blighted, the waters poisoned, and even the wind had ceased to blow.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004840_HYTHLODAEUS……でも、この星からはすでに多くの種が失われ、
大地は死に、水は濁り、風さえも淀んでいた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004850_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Once more did our people give of themselves to Zodiark. Another half of our race sacrificed to cleanse the world; to ensure that trees and grasses and myriad tiny lives would sprout and grow and flourish.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004850_HYTHLODAEUSそこで、さらにまた半数がゾディアークに命を捧げ……
星を清め、木々や小さな命たちを芽吹かせたのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004860_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The cycle of life had begun anew, and we reconsidered the means by which we might protect it.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004860_HYTHLODAEUSそうして、再び命が巡りだしたとき……
人類は、いかにしてこの星を護り続けるかを再考した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004870_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Convocation decided thus: we would nurture our world until it was bursting with vitality. Then, when the time was right, we would offer some portion of its living energy to Zodiark...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004870_HYTHLODAEUS十四人委員会の出した結論は、こうだ。
世界を育み、それが再び十分に満ち足りたときに、
いくらかの生命をゾディアークに捧げる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004880_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In return, He would restore to us those brethren whose souls had fed His strength, and together we would resume our role as stewards.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004880_HYTHLODAEUSそれによって、
ゾディアークの中に力として取り込まれた同胞たちを、
地上に復活させ……皆でまた、世界を管理する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004890_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>There were, however, those who disagreed with this plan. They argued that enough had been sacrificed to Zodiark─that this new world should belong to the lives newly born.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004890_HYTHLODAEUS……だが、それを良しとしない人々がいた。
彼らは、ゾディアークに命を捧げるのをやめ、
新しい世界を、生まれ来る命たちに任せるべきだと言うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004900_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>These dissidents surrendered their life energies in the creation of Hydaelyn, an incarnation of their opposing belief. And for the first time in history, our people stood divided... Know you, then, how this conflict ended?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004900_HYTHLODAEUSそして自分たちの命から、対のもの、ハイデリンを創り出した。
人類ははじめて2つに分かれて戦い……結果は知っているかな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004910_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Hm, I thought you might.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004910_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>……そっか。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004920_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Emet-Selch has ever been a champion for the will of Zodiark.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004920_HYTHLODAEUSエメトセルクたちは、
まだゾディアークの名のもとに動いているようだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004930_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The original plan may have been set back by millennia, but he will have not abandoned his course. He will pay the price for our return by whatever means is necessary.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004930_HYTHLODAEUS当初の計画よりも、だいぶ回り道になっているけれど……
きっとまだ、諦めていないんだ。
あれに何かしらの命を捧げ、同胞を取り戻すことを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004940_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And though he may carry himself with a certain glib ease, Emet-Selch is not a man to bear his burdens lightly. In fact, I imagine they have only grown heavier with every passing century...<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004940_HYTHLODAEUSというか……根が真面目な彼のことだ、
厭だ厭だと言いながら、背負ったものを、
誰にも託せなくなっているんだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004950_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...'Tis truly a terrible weight he has chosen to carry.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004950_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>……残酷な役回りだよ、本当にね。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004960_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004960_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>次でお待ちの方……。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004970_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>It seems your turn has come. Pray do not let me keep you.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004970_HYTHLODAEUSキミの番が来たようだ。
どうぞ、いっておいで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004980_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Ah, there was one last thing. You walk with another at your side, yes?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004980_HYTHLODAEUS……ああそうだ、最後にもうひとつだけ。
キミのそばには……多分もうひとり、いるだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004990_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Nay, I see no definite form...just the faintest suggestion of a second soul. I doubt it visible to anyone but me.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_004990_HYTHLODAEUSいや、姿形は見えていないんだけれどね。
うっすらと……本当に薄くだけど、もうひとつの魂が視える。
これを捉えられるのは、ワタシくらいのものかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005000_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Otherwise, I assume only <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can see and hear this ethereal companion?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005000_HYTHLODAEUSそれで……キミだけは、
その子に干渉できたりするんじゃないかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005010_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hm hm hm... Your connection is hardly a coincidence. In our time, the two of you were one─the color of your souls tells the tale.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005010_HYTHLODAEUSフフ……それは偶然じゃないよ。
キミとその子の魂は、同じ色をしている。
ワタシたちの時代において、ひとつだったのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005020_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A hue that distinctive cannot be mistaken, no matter how thin the soul is spread.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005020_HYTHLODAEUSそんな不思議な色の魂は……
うん、いくつに分かたれていても、間違えようがない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005030_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hah! This is just the kind of fate I might expect for one such as he. Surely Emet-Selch has recognized the hint of “him” in you...?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005030_HYTHLODAEUSまったく、実に「あの人」らしい運命だ。
エメトセルクも、彼には思い入れがあるだろうから、
キミがそうだと、気づいているかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005040_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hah! This is just the kind of fate I might expect for one such as she. Surely Emet-Selch has recognized the hint of “her” in you...?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005040_HYTHLODAEUSまったく、実に「あの人」らしい運命だ。
エメトセルクも、彼女には思い入れがあるだろうから、
キミがそうだと、気づいているかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005050_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var><var 29 EB02 /var>...?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005050_AMAUROTADMINISTRATOR<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>次でお待ちの方……。<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005060_HYTHLODAEUS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Fare you well, my new old friend. May you find what it is you seek.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05005_005060_HYTHLODAEUSでは、良い結末を。
懐かしく、新しいキミ…………
